content: loopy petals daisy by jennifer christensen materials  small amount of any size yarn or thread using the appropriate hook size for the weight of the yarn or thread being used note daisy in photo was made with red heart sport with a 3 75mm hook  yarn needle  any kind of accessory to attach it to ex pinback hairclip hairtie etc  fabric glue or matching thread and needle loopy petals daisy flower center with color choice for center chain 2 round 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet 5 more times in same chain do not join 6 single_crochet round 2 working in front loop only of round 1 2 single_crochet in next st repeat 5 more times finish off 12 single_crochet flower petals with color choice for petals join with a slip_stitch in any free loop of round 1 on the back of the flower center chain 13 join with slip_stitch in same loop chain 13 join with slip_stitch in next loop repeat around to last loop join with slip_stitch in 1st loop finish off 14 petals attach daisy with glue or by sewing on to chosen accessory midknightstarr webs com midknightstarr wordpress com midknightstarr@gmail com copyright 2007-2014
